scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Louis Bromfield, Paris, France, to James V. Barrett, Dorchester, Massachusetts. This letter refers to Mr. Edgett and an article in the Transcript, comments on his books A Good Womanand The Green Bay Tree, mentions John Shane.
